id: God is realer than any fear that comes.
title: Repeat after me:
content:
God is realer than any fear that comes.

I am divinely protected by God.

I am loved by God without condition.

By divine decree, nothing can ever happen that is not in my favour.

Nothing ever moves

id: The worst thing you have to fight in this life - you have to fight alone.
content:
**JACK OF FACES** @JackOfFaces [2025-07-17](https://x.com/JackOfFaces/status/1945871879761256941)

id: What is keeping you from experiencing miracles is your inability to access the miracle that was hidden within your heart.
title: What is keeping you from experiencing miracles is your inability to access the miracle that was hidden within your heart.
content:
Your mind opens portals.

Your spirit maintains them.

This war has no other battlefield than the collective heart of humanity.
